SPECIALS.TITLE: Monthly Specials at the Jazz Warehouse
SPECIALS.MESSAGE: Here are some of the latest specials from the Jazz Warehouse. Please note that all Miles Davis & John Coltrane CD's will be on sale for the month of March.
SPECIALS.CD: Kind of Blue Miles Davis US: $11.99 UK: £8.39 So What Freddie Freeloader Blue in Green All Blues Flamenco Sketches
Cookin' Miles Davis US: $7.99 UK: £5.59 My Funny Valentine Blues by Five Airegin Tune-Up
Blue Train John Coltrane US: $8.99 UK: £6.29 Blue Train Moment's Notice Locomotion I'm Old Fashioned Lazy Bird
